video_prompt: Glowing cyan roots pulse and branch across ancient trees. A black cat's yellow eyes shift, observing from behind the pulsating trunk. Misty background trees faintly illuminate.
image_prompt: **Vertical shot of a magical forest. A massive, ancient tree in the foreground with glowing cyan roots and branches dominating the lower half. A black cat with piercing yellow eyes peeks from behind the tree. Other similar glowing trees recede into the misty background. Soft, diffused lighting illuminates lush green foliage and dark earth with vibrant moss.**
refined_video_prompt: Cyan roots dynamically pulse and visibly branch, their radiant glow expanding and receding across the bark. A black cat's yellow eyes subtly shift, its gaze observing from concealment, as its head makes minor adjustments. Background mist gently swirls, causing distant silhouettes to softly illuminate and then fade.
